query:
UPDATE on_chain_job_backer_payouts SET (id, 
job_id, 
payout_id) = ((CASE $2::boolean WHEN TRUE THEN $3 ELSE id END), (CASE $4::boolean WHEN TRUE THEN $5 ELSE job_id END), (CASE $6::boolean WHEN TRUE THEN $7 ELSE payout_id END)) WHERE id = $1 RETURNING id as "id!: i32", 
job_id as "job_id!: i32", 
payout_id as "payout_id!: i32"
